text: Richfield Public Schools is a school district in Richfield, Minnesota. ==Schools== * Richfield Senior High School * Richfield Middle School * Richfield STEM Elementary School * Sheridan Hills Elementary School * Centennial Elementary School * Richfield Dual Language School *Richfield College Experience Program ==See also== * List of school districts in Minnesota ==External links== * Richfield Public Schools Category:School districts in Minnesota Category:Education in Hennepin County, Minnesota Category:Richfield, Minnesota
